product.title: NuWatt 2 ft. x 4 ft. Integrated Backlit LED Panel 3-Color Changing Temperatures Wattage Selectable Dimmable 120-277V (4-Pack)
product.description: Introducing the NuWatt 4 Pack 2x4 LED Panel for Drop-In Ceiling - your ultimate solution for superior illumination and energy efficiency. With three wattage options of 50W, 40W, and 30W, these panels offer customizable brightness to suit any environment. This panel is truly personalized with a 3 Lumen Select feature: choose from 3300LM, 4400LM, and 5500LM. Decide from 3 Color Temperatures 3500K, 4000K, and 5000K to create the ideal ambiance for your space. These LED Ceiling 2x4 Panels are engineered to work seamlessly across a broad voltage range, from 120V to 277V. This makes them suitable for a wide range of applications and simplifies installation. Perfect for a 2x4 LED Panel 220v project up to 277V. Adjust the brightness to your preference with a 0-10V dimmer. These panels are UL-listed, ensuring compliance with rigorous safety standards, and DLC Certified, indicating their performance. Installing these panels is a breeze. They are designed to fit perfectly into standard 2x4 drop ceiling grids, making retrofitting or upgrading your existing lighting a hassle-free process. Constructed with high-quality materials such as Iron and an acrylic non-yellowing lens these LED 2x4 LED Panel Lights are built to last. They have a long operational lifespan of up to 50,000, which reduces the need for frequent replacements and maintenance NuWatt, Lighting Your World.
feature_bullets: Dimmable 2X4 Ft LED Drop Ceiling Panel with a durable frame
descriptive_attributes: Selectable Wattage Feature: This 2x4 Flat Panel LED Light comes equipped with customizable options. Choose from three energy-efficient power settings - 50W, 40W, or 30W - to customize brightness levels without sacrificing performance, making it ideal for various applications from residential homes to commercial spaces.

Selectable Color Feature: The LED Flat Panel Light 2x4 dimmable low profile design integrates seamlessly into any drop-in ceiling, providing 3 Color Selectable options ranging from 3500K Neutral White, 4000K, Cool White, and 5000K Daylight. Switch effortlessly between warm to cool tones to perfectly tailor the ambiance of your space, making these flat panel LED lights drop-in adaptable for any environment.

Selectable Lumen Output: Experience unparalleled lighting flexibility with our 24"x 48" Square Ceiling Panel. The 2x4 LED flat panel light allows you to adjust the luminosity from 3300LM to 4400LM up to a Super Bright 5500LM providing the optimal brightness level for any setting-be it residential, commercial, or industrial.

0-10V Dimmable & Wide Voltage Range: Engineered with a 0-10V dimming capability, this 2x4 LED panel allows you to fine-tune your lighting environment with precision. Its electrical compatibility spans a broad voltage range from 120V to 277V, ensuring seamless integration into any drop ceiling grid.

Drop-In Ceiling Mount: Specifically designed for effortless installation, our LED panel lights ceiling 2x4 easily fit into your existing drop-in ceiling grid, offering both aesthetic appeal and reduced installation time.

UL Listed Certification for Maximum Safety and Reliability: Rigorously tested and compliant with 120V-277V electrical standards, this NuWatt 4 Pack 12x48 inch LED Panel ensures not just superior performance but also adheres to stringent safety guidelines, making it a trusted choice for both commercial and residential installations.

Versatile Installation Options: Designed for compatibility with both 2x4 drop ceiling LED flat light panel configurations and surface mount LED panel kits or suspension kits (sold separately), this product offers flexibility for diverse installation requirements.

NuWatt Advantage: Leading US-based, family-owned LED lighting supplier with high-quality products, 5-year warranty, and dedicated customer support for a seamless experience. Choose reliability and exceptional service.

specifications.name: Manufacturer Warranty
specifications.value: five year limited warranty from date of original purpose.
